def upgrade() -> None:
    """Upgrade schema."""
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.add_column("beers", sa.Column("company_id", sa.Uuid(), nullable=True))
    op.execute(
        "UPDATE beers SET company_id = breweries.id FROM breweries where beers.company=breweries.name"
    )
    op.create_foreign_key(None, "beers", "breweries", ["company_id"], ["id"])
    # ### end Alembic commands ###
